name: Space Hunter (GAMEINC20)
description:
Evaluation Link: https://forms.gle/4UQrbiEv1nui5Wet5

Everything was fine in Naboo, a beautiful place where the most valuable things were hidden. One day, Straga and his minions come to Naboo and steal the most precious thing; Obramium which is a stick that can fulfil all your wishes.Captain Space needs to take actions by chasing them to save the city and space. In order to get the stick back, he needs to collect as many as he can to fill up his power. Will his star be enough to fight Straga?
